section_data.title: Strategy Consultant
details: Designed and implemented strategy to find local Bay Area partnerships for Microsoft initiative to increase digital literacy amongst adults that will be launched Summer 2018, advised under Director of Technology/Civic Innovation.

section_data.title: Product Development Extern
details:
Externs observe the client success team's interaction with new clients, sit in on client onboardings and team strategy meetings and meet with other teams and support staff.
Given individual projects on product review and creating help center articles (help.hustle.life)
Sat in on Salesforce integration training

section_data.title: IT Support & Development Intern
details:
Worked on Hackathon Platform Team; created web pages for Hackathon Platform site using HTML/CSS and programmed software architecture using Python and Django framework
Taught HTML/CSS, Robotics, and Entrepreneurship classes to 4th-8th graders

section_data.title: Galileo Learning
details: Built team spirit, developed individual relationships with campers and parents, assisted instructors in the classroom and oversaw campers’ experience with technology and innovation

section_data.title: President
details: Led the second largest DECA chapter in the state of California, with over 200 members
Collaborated with chapter presidents and state officers to host 3 mini conferences for over 150 students

Competitor (Fall 2013 – Spring 2017)
        Participated in the 2017 International Career Development Conference

section_data.title: Nigerian Partnership Chair
details: Raised $5,000 for struggling businesses in Bauchi, Nigeria to help build local infrastructure and provide basic needs to small business owners
Responsibilities included facilitating communication between Nigerian partner and creating/managing team website (dvhsibap.org)

section_data.title: Advocate
details: Prepared one case a month by meeting with client, defending them in official court trial and recommending sanctions to jury
Represented over 25 juvenile delinquents and helped them to overcome the consequences of their offenses through peer support

section_data.title: Contract Consultant
details: Consultant at Valley Consulting Group at UC Berkeley dedicated to solving problems for various companies, such as Microsoft, Google, Airbnb, Square, etc.
Worked recently with Microsoft in the aspects of accessibility tech and initiatives
